Articles.Content: how many people have cats named Hobbes here?

I like cats but neither have the time nor space to care for one.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-22T19:17:13Z" title="06/22/2015 07:17  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 22, 2015</time> by Tex\_NL**
I own two cats, (or they own me).
Well, looks like I'm the odd one out!

> 
> I own two cats, (or they own me).

I believe the view of most 'pets' is that we (humans) are nothing more than 2-legged fur-less food dispensers ... except for dogs, they think we're Gods. lol

> 
> I believe the view of most 'pets' is that we (humans) are nothing more than 2-legged fur-less food dispensers ... except for dogs, they think we're Gods. lol

*"I am fond of pigs. Dogs look up to us. Cats look down on us. Pigs treat us as equals."*

Sir Winston Churchill
